include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    int zippo[4][2] = { 
    {2,4},
    {6,8},
    {1,3},
    {5,7}
    };

    printf("zippo = %p,\t\tzippo + 1 = %p\n", zippo, zippo + 1) ;
    printf("zippo[0] = %p,\t\tzippo[0] + 1 = %p\n", zippo[0], zippo[0] + 1) ;
    printf(" *zippo = %p,\t\t*zippo + 1 = %p\n", *zippo, *zippo + 1) ;
    printf("zippo[0][0] = %d\n", zippo[0][0]) ;
    printf("*zippo[0] = %d\n", *zippo[0]) ;
    printf("**zippo = %d\n", **zippo) ;
    printf("zippo[2][1] = %d\n", zippo[2][1]) ;
    printf(" *(*(zippo+2)+1) = %d\n ", *(*(zippo + 2)+1)) ;

    printf("*(zippo +2) = %d\n", **(zippo + 2)) ;
    return 0 ;
}
